ygData.subject: Re What about the lvl 24 song
ygData.msgSnippet: As of two days ago, when singing Clouding in my party, everyone in the party could see all invis ed PCs both in and out side the party. Very interesting
ygData.messageBody:
As of two days ago, when singing Clouding in my party, everyone in the party
could see all invis'ed PCs both in and out side the party. Very interesting
effect, and I like it...makes me wonder what will happen with Concord (24 -
see invis). My suspicion is that Verant hasn't figured out yet that Clouding
now supercedes Concord...once they do, I expect a nerf.
Latharia Cadeirfardd
Bard of the 24th Chorus
Povar

-----Original Message-----
Message: 3
Date: Sun, 20 Feb 2000 16:19:26 -0500
From: "Blitz Krieg" <blitz_krieg@...>
Subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?

> I keep hearing this and hopefully this will make you all realize that the
> see invis song is still useful. Clouding only gives party see invis. In
> other words, the only invis you can see are the members of your party that
> you have invissed. You do not see all invisible creatures and players,
only
> those in your party.

Actually, you can see invised membets of your party whether they are invised
under their own spell or yours. :) But, your point stands that you can't
see anyone else outside your party who is invised.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony

Message: 5

Subject: Re: What about the lvl 24 song?

seems like I can see anybody invisssed around me, whether in the group or
not...

but I could be wrong...
